scripts.update-react-ui: npm run pack-given-client-libs @haulmont/jmix-react-ui && npm run update-given-client-libs react-client-scr react-ui
scripts.update-react-core: npm run pack-given-client-libs @haulmont/jmix-react-core && npm run update-given-client-libs react-client-scr react-core
scripts.update-react-core-and-ui: npm run pack-given-client-libs @haulmont/jmix-react-ui @haulmont/jmix-react-core && npm run update-given-client-libs react-client-scr react-core react-ui
scripts.react-all: npm run bootstrap-react-app && npm run bootstrap-cuba-app && npm run start-cuba-app && npm run start-react-app
scripts.react-native-all: npm run bootstrap-react-native-app && npm run bootstrap-cuba-app && npm run start-cuba-app && npm run start-react-native-app
scripts.test:all: npm run test:coverage && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: echo 'UNIT TESTS AND COVERAGE' && lerna run coverage
scripts.test:integration: echo 'INTEGRATION TESTS ON GENERATED APP' && lerna run test:e2e --scope @haulmont/jmix-front-generator
scripts.test:e2e: echo 'PUPPETEER E2E TESTS' && npm test react-client-scr/ --prefix test-pup
scripts.snyk:wizard-scr: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 && node scripts/audit/snyk.js wizard react-client-scr true .snyk-react-client-scr
scripts.validate-react-app: prettier --check react-client-scr/**/*.ts && CI=true npm test --prefix react-client-scr
